formdata.description: Optional thumbnail files for videos. Must match order of media files.

request.description:
Generated from cURL: curl -X DELETE https://your-domain.com/delete-coupon \
  -H "Authorization: Bearer YOUR_TOKEN" \
  -H "Content-Type: application/json" \
  -d '{"couponId":"YOUR_COUPON_ID"}'
